dmca.title: FW: Letter to Alexander Balandin

________________________________

From: Wolf, Douglas [mailto:Doug.Wolf@wolfgreenfield.com]

Subject: FW: Letter to Alexander Balandin

Please consider the attached. 

Doug

Subject:        Letter to Alexander Balandin

Sirs: 

Please see the attached letter. 

Douglas R. Wolf
dougwolf@wolfgreenfield.com
